author: Colin Gleeson
title: Law Society offering grants to rural solicitor firms
description: Grants of €25,000 designed to help smaller practices with cost of employing trainees
content:
The Law Society of Ireland is offering grants of 25,000 to assist smaller firms and practices in rural areas with the cost of employing trainee solicitors.
The Small Practice Traineeship Grant is designed to boost smaller solicitor practices that are located… [+1129 chars]
